alert.note: Alert for Cass; Ransom (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 10:38AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Enderlin. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. Little Moorhead section of town begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 10.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Sunday was 10.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
